info.name: Tematica Test
info.description:
### Temática

##### GET

- ById: [http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id](http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id)
    
    - Body: {}
        
    - Parameters:
        
        - id: Stands for the `tematica` id in the database.
            
    - Return:
        
        - A JSON Object with the `tematica` information.
            
- All: [http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/](http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/)
    
    - Body: {}
        
    - Parameters: \[\]
        
    - Return:
        
        - POST
            
- Create `Tematica`: [http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/](http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/)
    
    - {"tema": "String","area": "String"}
        
- ‎
    
    - Parameters: \[\]
        
    - Return:
        
        - A JSON Object with the HTTP Status of the operation.
            

##### PUT

- Update `tematica`: [http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id](http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id)
    
    - Body:
        
    - {"tema": "String","area": "String"}
        
- ‎
    
    - Parameters: \[\]
        
    - Return:
        
        - A JSON Object with the HTTP Status of the operation.
            

##### DELETE

- Delete `tematica`: [http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id](http://localhost:8080/api/tematicas/:id)
